translations.translation: The magicians threw themselves down, prostrating.
Then the magicians fell prostrating in adoration,
Thereupon the magicians fell down in prostration,
The magicians fell down in adoration
The magicians therefore fell down prostrate.
And the sorcerers fell down prostrate.
And the magicians were thrown down prostrate;
so the sorcerers were cast down, bowing themselves.
And the wizards were flung prostrate,
Then the magicians flung themselves prostrate.
Thereat the magicians fell down prostrating.
Then did the sorcerers fall down, prostrate in adoration,
And the sorcerers fell down prostrate.
so the sorcerers were cast down, prostrating themselves,
And the magicians fell down prostrating.
So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].
[26:46] So the sorcerers fell down prostrating.

(And the wizards were flung prostrate) they fell prostrate so fast that it looked that they were thrown to the floor, because when they saw their ropes and staffs disappear, they knew that what Moses brought was from Allah,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَأُلْقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ } على الفور { سَاجِدِينَ } الشعراء: 46] متذللين، واضعين جباههم على تراب المذلة استحياءً من مقابلة أباطيلهم معه
